name: intel-oneapi-vtune
description:
Intel oneAPI VTune Profiler. Installed in Perf driverless mode, detailed
here: https://software.intel.com/content/www/us/en/develop/documentation
/vtune-cookbook/top/configuration-recipes/profiling-hardware-without-
sampling-drivers.html Users can manually install drivers, please read
the instructions here: https://software.intel.com/content/www/us/en/deve
lop/documentation/vtune-help/top/set-up-analysis-target/linux-
targets/building-and-installing-the-sampling-drivers-for-linux-
targets.html
